entry.title: Sins (let me in)
entry.summary:
Author: kitsu_kitkat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,495Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 42

Summary: It all went without much issue, until the big blue giant opened his mouth and uttered the next few words in the same syrupy tone. “That's it, you are doing so good.” Oh. If Bruce was a lesser man, he would have stopped dead in his tracks. As it was, he simply disguised his stumble as an irregular patch of concrete and carried on. Where had that come from? Aka; Bruce needed to learn echolocation yesterday. He should learn something from the bats in his cave, then he wouldn't be forced to have realisations about himself in unfortunate situations like this.

entry.title: Single Dad Saturdays
entry.summary:
Author: Sugarof5oaks

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,533Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Logan Howlett never thought he would need a partner. OK, maybe need is not the right word. Logan would like a partner; however, when you are a single dad of five kids ranging in age from high school to preschool, your dating pool is very slim. However, that all can change one day when his nosy neighbors, who are best friends, decide to help with his dating life. Not to mention the sexy new neighbor that tolerates Logan's brooding behavior, will Logan find love, or will his temper close off opportunities that prevent him from finding love again?

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,319Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 85

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: one hundred words for shame
entry.summary:
Author: lowtideblood

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,191Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 120

Summary: The Seneschal blinked slowly; the ring translated this as understanding, albeit not without a tinge of disapproval. “As you say, Lantern. We are here in regards to the-,” They said, with a screeching feedback that was either meant to indicate annoyance or an encroaching panic attack- “D’th’yal’yan’tha’stall-Eir’gotuah-si of this place.”[SECOND OF HALF], the ring translates. [denoting caretaker, Watcher, the One Who Remains].”“Oh,” Hal said. Then, in a brilliant moment of word association, stepped aside to motion to Batman with one hand. “He’ll be your guy.”He watched as, immediately, the envoy turned to Batman and fell to their knees in supplication.(Or; A mistranslation during hostile negotiations begins with Batman being dubbed the Caretaker of Earth and ends exactly as you'd expect it to.)

entry.title: And I don't wanna go home yet
entry.summary:
Author: LuiGarMir

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,858Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 67

Summary: When Clark met Bruce, he didn’t think much of the man. Well, no. He’d had thoughts—a lot of them having to do with his chiseled jaw and strong shoulders—but he hadn’t seen past Batman’s dark, gloomy, unknowable persona.The man—barely a young adult when they met—had been polite and deadly efficient, but also cold and distant.Clark, a journalist at heart, wanted to know more about him, but Superman understood how precious secrecy and privacy were. So… He gave Batman some space.It took him years to discover the man’s civilian name. And it just so happened to be around the same time both men started getting closer. Or it was maybe the reason why they got close at all.
